short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download images and videos exclusively from Alibaba.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Personal or Sensitive User Data**

We do not collect, handle, store or share any user data. Our extension is intended to provide functionality across Alibaba website and doesn't require specific host permissions

How To Use Our Extension:

Alibaba Video & Image Downloader Wizard Pro provides a seamless and efficient way to download high-quality images and videos directly from product listings for educational and marketing purposes. With just a click, this extension allows users to effortlessly save their favorite product images and videos, making it easier to review, share, or keep a visual catalog of items of interest.

1. Go to the Alibaba website and search for the product you want.
2. Click on the product to open its page.
3. On the product page, turn on the Alibaba Video & Image Downloader extension. And select Image or Video and start downloading, please wait 3-5 seconds for the image or video to download.

New Update: We have recently added the ability to download the files in a zip folder instead of the traditional single download per file. 

If you've found this extension helpful, please consider leaving a rating. Your feedback is valuable in helping us improve and continue providing useful tools.

 This extension is not affiliated with Alibaba group of companies.
